entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
